titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the New York State Militia, 241st Regiment, Company of Gravesend election returns 1973.109
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:09:36 +0000.

did.unittitle: New York State Militia, 241st Regiment, Company of Gravesend election returns
did.abstract: One document containing a summary of election returns for non-commissioned officers in the Company of Gravesend of the 241st Regiment of the New York State Militia. The document was penned by the Captain of the Company, Jacobus Voorhees.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); New York State Militia, 241st Regiment, Company of Gravesend election returns, 1973.109, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

controlaccess.corpname: New York (State). Militia. Regiment, 241st. Company of Gravesend
